Title: Includes within class D felony of assault in the second degree the reckless assault of a child less than 7 years old resulting in serious physical injury
Summary: Includes within the provisions of the class D felony of assault in the second degree, the reckless causation of serious physical injury to a child under seven years of age, by a person eighteen years of age or older; provides that "serious physical injury", for the purposes of the penal law, shall include, in the case of a child under 7 years of age, subdural hemorrhage, intercranial hemorrhage and retinal hemorrhages.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the reckless assault of a child resulting in serious physical injury
